author: Jenny Strasburg
title: Deutsche Bank’s U.S. Head of Global Transaction Banking Is Leaving
text:
Deutsche Bank AG’s U.S. head of global transaction banking, Paul Saltzman, is leaving in March, according to an internal memo from the head of the unit, which provides trade financing and manages cash for companies and governments.
A Deutsche Bank spokesman confirmed Mr. Saltzman’s departure. The lender will name a successor “in the near future,” according to the memo sent Monday from transaction-banking global head John Gibbons. The unit’s global operations chief, meanwhile, will spend more time in the U.S. while temporarily...
